dict.string: Triangulum uses motion sensors (accelerometer, gyroscope, and magnetometer) to provide real-time sensor data visualization and recording for scientific and educational purposes.
Triangulum uses location services to provide GPS coordinates and altitude information alongside sensor readings for comprehensive environmental monitoring.
